name: Super Dooper Free Fall
description:
Super Dooper Free Fall
You are Bob. Bob likes to jump down pipes with colorful cubes. Have fun bob.

1.1-1.2 Hotfix

Found bug where rotation didn't stop when game was reset. Fixed.
Added Linux Build.

Avoid the obstacles for as long as you can. Your high score is your traveled distance.

Made for WGJ 123 - Theme Same but Different.
